# heavenya_crypto
ERC20 Token

## Deploy
[Test Network Heavenya URL](https://ropsten.etherscan.io/token/0xdeE10F0649f7D128Fe7699E22a1Ad62DFb48A254)

## Video Reference
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdNxXGGWJRI

## Tools Used

[Open Zeplin For Code Generation](https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/4.x/wizard)
[Meta Mask For Transaction ](https://metamask.io/)
[Faucet For Rapsten](https://faucet.euler.finance/)
[Remix Code Editor](https://remix.ethereum.org/?#&optimize=false&runs=200&evmVersion=null&version=soljson-v0.8.7+commit.e28d00a7.js)
